song.title: Scarecrow
song.info:
Lyrics:
I, what am I barely standing straight yet awake to see fading lights from a day
I, what have I but the shortest straws the one no one no one wants but the night
In its embrace the wan light of the moon glimmers its beauty upon the fields and unto me
I´m the scarecrow the unknown the freak no one wants to know
I, only if I could hold such beauty its light to know its secrets I would be free
I´m the scarecrow the unknown the freak no one wants to know
